title: Duke Nukem
notes: The 1991 game. DOSBox opens into command line mode, but it doesn't start the game.

title: Duke Nukem
notes: To launch, use DosBox's Quick Launch under main menu to select executable

title: Duke Nukem
notes:
(Not available in store)
To get it to run you need to perform these steps:

1, add this line in the launch option to the game in steam:
-conf "/FULL-PATH-TO-STEAMLIBRARY/steamapps/common/Duke Nukem 1/NUKEM1.conf"

2, open NUKEM1.conf in a text editor, and:
replace this "Mount C: .."
with this "mount c /FULL-PATH-TO-STEAMLIBRARY/steamapps/common/Duke Nukem 1"

after that the game loads/runs perfectly
